name: Super Basil 64
description:
WARNING : THIS GAME CONTAINS FLASHING LIGHTS AND LOUD NOISES.

SUPER BABIL 64 is the greatest platformer of the N64/PS1 generation. What was thought to be initially lost to time, has been uncovered from the depths of a small sewage pipe outside of OMOCAT headquaters. Featuring BABIL in the felt himself. Venture through many challenging worlds and defeat epic bosses in this free to play masterpiece. (MICRO TRANSACTIONS INCLUDED) .

5/5 - My mate Paul, "Yeah its alright I guess"

5/5 - Greg from down the road, "Please stop asking me to review your shitty fucking games, leave me the fuck alone"

0/5 - Crazy Bus Enjoyer, "No crazy bus."

Download BABIL and play now!! Also join the discord!!!

Voice acting by BruhMoment76 and Panecillo

Credit to Silvagunner. Shoutout to Simpleflips.

This is a FREE fangame based on OMORI by OMOCAT.
